text:
Hi everyone! just a QQ, Does anyone knows what’s the main difference between a developer sandbox and the currently “new” sandbox on the main site? I have already a pipeline done, but I don’t know if it’s kind of the same type of sandbox or not.

Thanks in advance! :)

Sorry about the confusion with the naming.

The new sandbox functionality is basically a clone of your production HubSpot account.

CMS Sandbox is a completely separate HubSpot account.

The data that _currently_ can be copied into the new sandbox
•  account tools and features(so HubSpot products you have on your production account is the same on the sandbox)
• Super Admins from the production account
• Object definitions - so you can safely experiment with custom objects without affecting real data.
• Pipelines - including pipelines for deals, tickets, custom objects, but not records currently in those pipelines.
• Themes, templates, and modules - does not currently sync website content emails or quotes.
More detail on

<https://www.HubSpot.com/products/sandbox>

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account/set-up-a-HubSpot-sandbox-account|how to set up a sandbox>

Hi there! I am trying to create a custom object through the API (which works fine). What I am stuck on is associating that new custom object with multiple owners (using a "HubSpot User"-type field). Does anyone know if that's possible?
